alert.note: Alert for Alger; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 01 at 3:26AM EDT until April 01 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 9 inches...heaviest south of a line from Skandia to Gwinn to Witch Lake and lightest up by Big Bay. Northeast winds gusting as high as 50 mph will cause low visibities in the blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Marquette and Alger Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds, in combination with wet, heavy snow, may lead to downed tree limbs and power outa
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
